jei.anvilcraft.info.capacitor: Vous pouvez charger le condensateur vide dans le chargeur pour l'obtenir.

jei.anvilcraft.info.end_dust: Any falling block, except for anvils and Dragon Egg, will be converted into End Dust when fall through end portal.
jei.anvilcraft.info.geode_1: Trouve des Géodes Améthyste à proximité lorsque vous utilisez.
jei.anvilcraft.info.geode_2: Lâché par des blocs d'améthyste Budding.

jei.anvilcraft.info.geode_4: Ou échangez-la avec un villageois joaillier

tooltip.anvilcraft.grid_information.over: Il semble que cette grille soit surchargée.
ou supprimez les composants à fort impact de contrainte.
tooltip.anvilcraft.heliostats.too_far: La pos d'éclairage est trop éloignée
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.anvil_hammer: Il s'agit d'un marteau, d'une enclume, d'une clé, de lunettes et d'une masse
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.batch_crafter: Received a redstone signal and synthesized all internal items at once, with a power consumption of 4 kW
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.block_devourer:
Activated by redstone:
	Swallows blocks in a 3*3 range in front.
Activated by an anvil:
	1 block -> 5 * 5
	2 blocks -> 7 * 7
There is no inventory, and items will be inputted into the block or physical inventory behind or form falling objects behind.
World base blocks such as stones, mud, lower bound rocks, and terminal stones will not drop 100%
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.block_placer:
Redstone activation placed a block in front of this, but was hit by an anvil and placed further away.
There is no stock available and items need to be retrieved from the blocks behind, fallen objects, or physical inventory
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.brass_pressure_p: Output a redstone signal based on the inventory's filling degree of player above, also a brass plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.bronze_pressure_: Output a redstone signal based on player satiety above, also a bronze plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.charge_collector: Collecter des redevances pour produire de l'électricité
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.charged_neutroni: No longer passing through blocks, storing a large amount of electrical energy
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.copper_pressure_: Redstone signal increases with pressing time, also a copper plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.crab_trap: Le placer dans l'eau pour vous aider à attraper des produits aquatiques
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.disk.clear: Shift + Right click to clear data stored
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.disk.store: Right click block to copy its setting
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.exposed_copper_p: Redstone signal increases with pressing time, also a copper plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.ferrite_core_mag: L'attraction de l'enclume en dessous, lorsqu'elle est poussée et tirée par le piston, provoque la génération de charges par les blocs de cuivre adjacents
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.geode: Trouvez la géode d'améthyste environnante lorsque vous l'utilisez
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.heater: Le chauffage du bloc au-dessus consomme 16 kW
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.heliostats:
Right click on the Netherite Block or Tungsten Block of the handheld heliostat to determine the irradiation point
After placing it, it will heat the irradiated block during the day
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.hollow_magnet_bl: L'attraction de l'enclume en dessous, lorsqu'elle est poussée et tirée par le piston, provoque la génération de charges par les blocs de cuivre adjacents
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.induction_light:
Lighting, with consumption of 1 kW
Right click on this with Redstone to change it to ripening mode
Right click on this with Glowstone Dust to change it to anti-monster spawning mode
Right click on this with Void Matter to change it to anti-animal spawning mode
The consumption of the above three modes will become 16 kW
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.ionocraft: It will float when placed in the power grid
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.ionocraft_backpa:
When equipping to start flying like gamemode creative
The backpack requires power supply from the grid or capacitors in the inventory for use
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.item_collector: Adjust power consumption based on range and cooling, from 30kW to 150kW
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.lead_pressure_pl: Output redstone signal based on the number of mob species above, also a lead plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.magnet: Attirer les objets environnants lors de l'utilisation
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.magnet_block: L'attraction de l'enclume en dessous, lorsqu'elle est poussée et tirée par le piston, provoque la génération de charges par les blocs de cuivre adjacents
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.negative_matter: Negative matter is not antimatter, it is anti gravity matter
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.negative_matter_: Negative matter is not antimatter, it is anti gravity matter
Negative matter is not antimatter, it is anti gravity matter
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.neutronium_ingot: Pass through most blocks except end dust, negative matter block, and bedrock
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.oxidized_copper_: Redstone signal increases with pressing time, also a copper plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.piezoelectric_cr: Charge générée par une chute d'enclume sur celui-ci
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.power_converter_: Convertit l'énergie en FE, consomme 9 kW
Convertit l'énergie en FE, consomme 3 kW
Convertit l'énergie en FE, consomme 1 kW
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.remote_transmiss: Build a power grid with a transmission length of 8
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.resin_block: Permet de capturer des créatures hostiles alliées ou faibles
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.royal_anvil_hamm: Il s'agit d'un marteau, d'une enclume, d'une clé, de lunettes et d'une masse
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.royal_grindstone: Explosion proof, Eliminating Curses and Punishing
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.royal_smithing_t: Explosion proof, Saving your Smithing Template
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.silver_pressure_: Output redstone signal based on the number of undead mobs above, also a silver plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.structure_tool.i: The size of input pattern must be same as output pattern
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.structure_tool.l: Right click to select an area for multiblock recipe
Blocks in the area will be the input of recipe
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.structure_tool.m: La zone sélectionnée doit être un cube

tooltip.anvilcraft.item.structure_tool.s: Shift + right click to clear selected area
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.tempering_glass: Explosion proof, No tools required on collect
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.tesla_tower: Electric shock to mobs or lightning rods within a range of 8 grids, with a power consumption of 128 kW
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.tin_can: Tin cans can be combined with any food to obtain canned food.
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.tin_pressure_pla: Output a redstone signal based on the lowest percentage of health of the mobs above, also a tin plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.titanium_pressur: Output a redstone signal based on the highest durability of the items above, also a titanium plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.topaz: Contenir la puissance de la foudre
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.transmission_pol: Build a power grid with a transmission length of 8
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.tungsten_pressur: Output redstone signal based on the number of fire-resistant entities above, also a tungsten plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.uranium_pressure: Output a redstone signal based on the lowest durability of the items above, also a uranium plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.weathered_copper: Redstone signal increases with pressing time, also a copper plate
tooltip.anvilcraft.item.zinc_pressure_pl: Output a redstone signal based on the highest percentage of health of the mobs above, also a zinc plate
